page.title: 10HOME LIFE CADDINGTON FAMILY
page.content: Saturday I got up at 8.30 and had break fast in the garden. Camilla and I cleaned Thumpers hutch, daddy fetched our TV and did some gardening. A friend came we played in the Wendy House. Mum came at 2 we had lunch and went to the hairdressers. We went to Mass at Our Lady, Luton.and then to the school disco, mum and dad did the bar. We went to bed at 12pm. On Sunday mum went to nurse at Stairways, Harpenden a home for handicapped children. We got up at 9.30 had breakfast, a shower and played on the computer. When mum came we went for a lunchtime drink at the Plough. I went to a party, Camilla and dad went to pick strawberries, mum slept. Dad, mum and Camilla had dinner I was full. We went to bed at 8pm. Dad watched TV and mum wrote some letters.
